txt.en: Enraged shades can be found roaming Amon Amrûn in the eastern Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should defeat shades that patrol the surface of the ruined tombs.
The ancient guardians of Amon Amrûn have awoken, pouring out of the tombs in a blind rage.
The ancient guardians of Amon Amrûn have awoken, pouring out of the tombs in a blind rage.
Enraged shades can be found roaming Amon Amrûn in the eastern Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should defeat shades that patrol the surface of the ruined tombs.
You have defeated a number of angry shades at Amon Amrûn.
You have defeated a number of angry shades at Amon Amrûn.
'It is our duty to offer the shades of Men freedom from their curse and call them to fight against Angmar...even more so in that these Men are our own kindred.'

'What? Who dares to interrupt my ancient vigil?

'You fool! How dare you remind me of our pathetic oaths to the craven Arvedui! We have sworn new oaths now!

'We follow Amarthiel, and soon we will sweep aside all the living fools of the North!'
Defeat enraged shades at Amon Amrûn
Talk to the shade of the Oathbreaker-captain
